Package org.consensusj.bitcoin.zeromq

Class RxBitcoinZmqBinaryService

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.consensusj.bitcoin.zeromq.RxBitcoinZmqBinaryService
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Closeable, java.lang.AutoCloseable, RxBlockchainBinaryService
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    RxBitcoinZmqService
    public class RxBitcoinZmqBinaryService
extends java.lang.Object
implements RxBlockchainBinaryService, java.io.Closeable
    Service to listen for ZMQ messages from multiple TCP ports. Uses Bitcoin Core JSON-RPC to find the TCP address of the required services. TODO: Support using all topics, notjust `rawblock` and `rawtx`.
